action.action-desc: Mr. Carter of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize COPS grantees to use grant funds for recruitment and retention of law enforcement officers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Recruit and Retain Act of 2023.

section.header: Use of COPS grant funds for recruitment and retention of law enforcement officers
section.text: Section 1701(b) of part Q of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10381(b)) is amendedâ€”
